title: Bug 18705 - Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The bug report lacks details regarding the observed behavior, expected behavior, and steps to reproduce.
OB: Experiencing frequent and excessive flashing in the Control Example, particularly in the UI elements.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, minimizing unnecessary flashing.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Interact with various UI elements.
3. Observe the excessive flashing that occurs during these interactions.
